import os
from getpass import getpass
os.environ['HF_USER_ACCESS_TOKEN'] = getpass("Please enter your HF token here:")

!pip install -q https://github.com/learning-at-home/hivemind/archive/dalle-v1.zip &> log
!git clone https://github.com/learning-at-home/dalle-hivemind &> log
!cd dalle-hivemind && pip install -q -r requirements.txt &> log
print("done!")

exp_name = "dalle-v1"
%env HF_ORGANIZATION_NAME=training-transformers-together
%env HF_MODEL_NAME={exp_name}
%env WANDB_API_KEY=bfcfdc646d9481c372938d5370b4f902f7d7f420
%env WANDB_ENTITY=learning-at-home
%env WANDB_PROJECT=dalle-hivemind-trainers


!ulimit -n 16384 && cd dalle-hivemind && python run_trainer.py --experiment_prefix {exp_name} --client_mode True \
 --initial_peers /ip4/52.232.13.142/tcp/31234/p2p/QmWMNBvt3VkVETzQ68Uk44PokVjwA8sSvEEB3z8WwA5ZAS /ip4/193.106.95.184/tcp/31234/p2p/QmegUJSucRpaUrozQoP8B5ocAXhdnxQDrTdoUu5trtCoWc /ip4/52.232.13.143/tcp/31234/p2p/Qme6k7Ey6qz1sqi3QVzwXbop4UA33NP2sv6BStJqnvbRef \
 --per_device_train_batch_size 1 --gradient_accumulation_steps 1 --matchmaking_time 20 --allreduce_timeout 120
source.e35b2951:
### Colab starter kit _This notebook is a part of [Training-Transformers-Together](training-transformers-together.github.io/) NeurIPS demonstration._ To participate in the demo training run, you need to follow these steps: 0. Ensure you are logged into your kaggle account, and GPU Accelerator and Internet connection are enabled in a menu on the right:

1. Log in on [huggingface.co](https://huggingface.co) * If you don't have an account or if you want to participate anonymously, you can create a new account at [huggingface.co/join](https://huggingface.co/join), 2. Join our organization using this [__invite link__](https://huggingface.co/organizations/training-transformers-together/share/otdYDceuoEIGEVXhrmYilPSnVUrnsrjJNz) 3. Create a new User Access token at [huggingface.co/settings/token](https://huggingface.co/settings/token) and copy it to the clipboard 4. Run the code below: it will ask you for your token, then setup and begin training. That's it! If everything is fine, you will soon see your contribution on the [__training dashboard__](https://huggingface.co/spaces/training-transformers-together/Dashboard). If you have any questions, technical difficulties or just want to chat about distributed training, you can find us here: [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=default&label=Discord&logo=discord&message=join)](https://discord.gg/uGugx9zYvN)
